title: Flight Lieutenant David Williams

details.body: At the familyâ€™s request, no further details will be made available. We request that the media respect this decision.

description: It is with deep regret that the Ministry of Defence can confirm that Flight Lieutenant David Williams was killed on Saturday, 22 March 2003, when an RAF GR4 Tornado aircraft from RAF Marham, which was returning from an operational mission, was engaged near the Kuwaiti border by a Patriot missile battery.
